social_posts.post_text:
I discovered that the new microfibre mittens from @bouncecurl are great for : ⁣
⁣
- absorbing excess water from your hair. Too much water and product can weigh it down and make your results FLAT instead of BOUNCY. This greatly reduces drying time also 🙌⁣
⁣
- scrunching out the crunchy gel cast faster than just using your hands. Less frizz too ✅⁣
⁣
- stroking your own face with it coz it’s ridiculously soft and just FEELS GOOD. ⁣
⁣
⁣
You’ll find these mittens (the brushes and the gel too) on BounceCurl.com,my discount code is power10 ⁣
⁣
AD ⁣
⁣
⁣

I have FINALLY found a high performance foam and it’s from one of my all time favourite brands : ⁣
@boucleme 🥰⁣
⁣
⁣
I was sent this new Super Volumising Foam 3 months ago and was allowed to just get on with experimenting and had zero pressure put on me to post so a huge thank you to Boucleme for being so cool 🙏⁣
⁣
⁣
I’m normally used to foams giving a purely fluffy result with minimal definition but not this one! ⁣
⁣
⁣
It gives so much definition AS WELL as volume - they’ve gifted us the holy grail combo 😭⁣
⁣
⁣
I have lots of super fine hair so lightweight products suit me best - this foam has consistently delivered for me, wash day after wash day… ⁣
⁣
⁣
I’m really excited to share a discount code with you guys! 😍😍😍⁣
⁣
Affiliate discount code: DOM15 ⁣
⁣
⁣
I’ve been using Boucleme for years now because the quality is THERE 🙌 ⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
If you have any questions then let’s chat in the comments - I have 3 months experience to share! 😊❤️⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣

I get tons of matted knots - especially at the nape of my neck - in my fine hair ALL THE TIME. ⁣
⁣
Short of permanently wearing a satin scarf around my shoulders, there’s not much I can do here, right? ⁣
⁣
What do you do in this situation??⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
#finehairproblems #finewavyhair #finecurlyhair #reels #finecurls ⁣

#over40style #thisis40something #40something #sezanelovers #sezaneaddict #sezanette #girlsinsezane  #violettefr

Watch me try the viral @bouncecurl Define Styling Brush 👀⁣
⁣
It gives insane results on type 3 and 4 curls - but will it work on my fine waves? ⁣
⁣
I am a LAZY styler and never bother with sectioning (I have a lot of hair). I just grabbed random areas and brushed UP and AWAY from my scalp. ⁣
⁣
You’ll notice the brush straightens out my wet hair - I never, EVER get that curl “boing” like tighter textures do. ⁣
⁣
This is NORMAL 😎 ⁣
⁣
My waves naturally form again after scrunching and tighten up as they dry. That’s just wavy hair 😊⁣
⁣
⁣
Results : mega volume with tons of movement and definition, no stiffness or crunch 😍 ⁣
⁣
⁣
This brush just KEEPS SELLING OUT and it’s BACK IN STOCK! ⁣
⁣
⁣
You’ll find all the products shown here on BounceCurl.com
⁣
AD ⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣

If you’re curious about any other conditioner that I’ve not mentioned here, go ahead and ask me about it anyway coz I’ve probably tried it 🫠 ⁣
 ⁣
In order of appearance, not preference: ⁣
⁣
1. The Ordinary conditioner ⁣
2. Aveda Pure Abundance Volumizing Clay conditioner ⁣
3. Ecoslay Banana Cream deep conditioner ⁣
4. Righteous Roots Citrus Slip conditioner ⁣
5. Garnier Ultimate Blends Coconut Water and Aloe Water conditioner ⁣
6. Aveda Sap Moss conditioner ⁣
7. Bounce Curl Super Smooth Cream conditioner ⁣
⁣
⁣
What are your experiences with these?? ⁣
⁣
⁣

I tried out the @silkelondon hair wrap and really like how it helps extend my wash day results 🙌⁣
⁣
I like to get as much value as I can out of my time and my styling products so I don’t wash my hair every day. Protecting my hair overnight in this 100% silk hair wrap allows the natural oils to be absorbed by my HAIR and not my pillowcase… ⁣
⁣
I found the hair wrap comfortable & secure enough to sleep in all night. Also really love those hair ties - no snagging at all and really comfy! ⁣
⁣
You can get 10% off @silkelondon with my code DOMINIQUE10 – link in bio ✨⁣
⁣
Let me know if you have any questions about my ⁣
experience with these 😊⁣
⁣
⁣
#silkelondon #sponsoredpost ⁣
#silkhairwrap #overnightcurlprotection ⁣

Rice water rinses and apple cider vinegar final rinses have been some of my favourite go to’s for a few years now for fixing funky hair that’s not behaving right or for when I want guaranteed shiny and defined styling results. ⁣
⁣
I want to grow my hair out again so I’ll be relying on the unbelievable rice water benefits to help with that 😍⁣
⁣
It’s so satisfying that these are both natural, affordable and easy 🙌 ⁣
⁣
A huge thank you to @themestizamuse for her wonderful posts and blog articles that have taught me so much about these two game changers 🥰 ⁣
⁣
Shoot any questions you have, happy to spread the word about these wonderful treatments that never fail me 😊 ⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
#applecidervinegarrinse #acvrinse #naturalhairtreatment #ricewater #applecidervinegar #ricewaterforhairgrowth #ricewaterhairrinse #ricewaterrinse #cheaphairtreatment #frizzfreecurls #mermaidhairdontcare ⁣
#finewavyhair #finecurlyhair #finecurls  #wavyhairdontcare #wavyhairtips #blondewavyhair ⁣
#wavycurls #finehair #hairgrowthtips

I’ve been struggling with the effects of hard water build up recently but I’m over the hump, I think! 🤞⁣
⁣
Hopefully you’ll learn from my mistake and find these slides helpful…⁣
⁣
And remember : a clarifying shampoo is not necessarily a chelating shampoo 🤓⁣
⁣
I’ll share a wonderful chelating shampoo guide by @themestizamuse in stories as well as a great post from @welshiecurlgirl about tackling build up 🙌⁣
⁣
⁣
Please share YOUR hard water tips, favourite products and experiences for both hair AND skin, that would be so helpful! 🫶⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
#hardwater #hardwaterbuildup #chelatingshampoo #detoxshampoo #chelating #finehairproblems #bumbleandbumble #sundayshampoo #acvrinse #applecidervinegar ⁣
#clarifyingshampoo #frizzfreecurls #mermaidhairdontcare #ouai #ouiahaircare⁣
#finewavyhair #finecurlyhair #finecurls  #wavyhairdontcare #wavyhairtips #blondewavyhair ⁣
#wavycurls #finehair

Due to very hard water in my area, a chelating shampoo that removes limescale mineral deposits from my scalp and hair is a non negotiable. 

See my previous post for what happened when I stopped using one for a few months 🤦‍♀️

Clarifying shampoos without chelating ingredients will only remove product build up from your hair - any mineral deposits won’t be removed. So keep that in mind! 

Shampoos featured in the slides: 

✨Bumble and Bumble Sunday Shampoo (chelating)
✨Ouai Detox Shampoo (chelating) 
✨Kinky Curly Come Clean (chelating) 
✨Bounce Curl Gentle Clarifying Shampoo (mild clarifying) 
✨Celeb Luxury Gem Lites shampoo in shade Sunstone Blonde. Not chelating or clarifying. This one injects a bright shade of warm golden blonde tones back into my hair as needed. 
✨K18 Peptide Prep (clarifying & mild chelating)
✨Bounce Curl Turmeric Purifying Hair and Scalp mask (not technically a shampoo but can be added as a booster to your shampoo. Clarifying and natural chelating due to high concentration of apple cider vinegar)

Save this post for easy reference, I hope it’s useful!  What would you add to this list??
